hero.headline: Empower Your Waitstaff
hero.subheadline: A dedicated mobile interface for captains to take orders table-side faster and more accurately than ever before.

features.title: Captain Ordering Made Easy
features.description: Designed for rapid entry. Captains can punch in orders with just a few taps.

features.title: Order Editing
features.description: Mistakes happen. The Captain app allows easy modification of running orders without friction.

features.title: Captain Management
features.description: Keep an eye on the floor. See which tables are occupied, waiting for food, or ready to pay.

reviews.author: Sarah Jenkins
reviews.text: Cravings transformed how we handle orders during rush hour. The digital menu is a lifesaver!

reviews.author: David Chen
reviews.text: The best investment we made this year. Customers love scanning the code and ordering directly.

reviews.author: Emily Rodriguez
reviews.text: Insanely easy to update. We change our specials daily and it takes seconds.

reviews.author: Michael Chang
reviews.text: Inventory management is finally under control. We cut wastage by 20% in the first month.

reviews.author: Priya Patel
reviews.text: Marketing tools are powerful. The automated campaigns brought back so many old customers.

faq.question: Does it work on any phone?
faq.answer: Yes, it's a web-based app that works on any smartphone with a browser.

faq.question: Can I restrict what captains can see?
faq.answer: Yes, the Captain role has restricted access. They cannot access sensitive financial data or admin settings.

cta.title: Speed up your service
cta.description: Give your captains the best tool for the job.
